Name: team_size_min
Description: Ensure team size is at least 3 members

Name: worker_availability_threshold
Description: Worker availability must be greater than 0.7

Name: feature_effort_max
Description: The estimated effort for a feature must not exceed 100 story points

Name: sprint_duration_fixed
Description: Sprint duration must be exactly 14 days

Name: story_points_positive
Description: Story points for a User Story must be a positive integer

Name: blocker_resolved_date
IsSum: it must have a resolved_on date

Name: scrum_master_experience
Description: Scrum Master must have an experience level of at least 2
